product.product_title: Obtaom Women?s Play Fashion Sneaker White Color Washed and Leopard Canvas Slip on Shoes
product.cushioning: Basic cushioned insole provides adequate comfort for casual, everyday wear.
product.breathability: Breathable canvas upper keeps feet cool and comfortable throughout the day.
product.short_description: Add a touch of playful style to your everyday look with the Obtaom Women's Play Fashion Sneaker. These charming slip-on shoes are designed for the woman who loves to express her personality through fashion. Featuring a unique and eye-catching design, the upper combines a clean, white color-washed canvas with bold leopard print accents, creating a fun and fashionable statement piece for your feet. The slip-on style, complete with elastic gore panels, ensures effortless on-and-off convenience and a comfortable, secure fit. The breathable canvas upper keeps your feet cool, making them perfect for all-day wear. A flexible, durable outsole provides reliable traction. Whether you're pairing them with jeans, leggings, or a casual skirt, these Obtaom fashion sneakers are the perfect way to inject a dose of personality and comfort into your casual wardrobe. Step out and play with style.
product.about_this_item: FABRIC UPPER: 235g fabric upper with moderate yarn thickness, breathable, soft, keeps dry. SOLE: Rubber sole, quiet, soft, anti-skid. STURDY: Vulcanized three times under high pressure, elastic band or laces, super comfort padding. Perfect slip-on fashion sneaker for women.
